curl --request POST \
  --url http://led_strip.local/set_led_strip \
  --header 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data; boundary=---011000010111000001101001' \
  --form 'color_array=000f0000,000f0000,000f0010,000f0000,000f1200,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000,000f0000'
